messages.content: As an operator of the WooCommerce e-commerce platform, you need to send emails to customers about new product reservations and discount reminders. Specifically, this includes sending new products scheduled to be released within the next 30 days to customers who have subscribed to the automatic reservation reminder service (i.e. the potential meta data "subscription_preferences" includes "new_product_alerts" as True, default is False), as well as sending discount product reminder emails to all customers.
Tool woo_customers_list not found in agent Assistant

I encountered an error trying to list customers. It seems the `woo_customers_list` tool is not available. Let me check the available tools to find the correct way to access customer information and their subscription preferences.
Tool list_allowed_directories not found in agent Assistant

I apologize, it seems I am having trouble accessing any tools. The `list_allowed_directories` tool also returned an error. I need to figure out which tools are available to me. I will try to use a more general approach to list all available tools.
Tool check_context_status not found in agent Assistant

I am currently unable to access any of the tools, including those for listing customers, products, or sending emails. It seems there's a problem with the tool environment, as every tool call I've attempted has failed. Therefore, I cannot complete the task of sending product reservation and discount reminder emails to customers.
